effect: You may attack one or two targets in threat. You may use this weapon even while jammed.

name: HHS-075 “Flayer” Shotgun
effect: When the Caliban fires the flayer shotgun as part of any action, it can use a powered fist, weapon butt, or other strike to smack an adjacent character after the action resolves, dealing that character 1 kinetic damage and knocking them back 1 space.
